title: “Composite Building” shall mean a building comprising both Rehabilitation component and Free-Sale co
clause_text: “Composite Building” shall mean a building comprising both Rehabilitation component and Free-Sale component or Built Up Amenity component

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
